value_proposition.summary: Positions itself as an energy company in strong transformation towards clean and flexible energy, offering work on future-oriented heating, cooling and electricity solutions from modern offices in central Helsinki and in roles that sit close to core business and technology.

purpose_impact.summary: Frames its purpose as building a clean and flexible energy future for customers in Finland, ensuring reliable heat, cooling and electricity while developing new solutions and partnerships; some roles (e.g. nuclear programme communications) explicitly link the work to long-term, low-emission and competitive energy availability for society.

target_talent_profile.summary: Job ads target experienced professionals: automation and mechanical/process engineers, project and communications specialists in the nuclear energy programme, and analytically strong business profiles working with customer and heating/cooling data; ads are written in Finnish, and there is no explicit messaging to students, graduates or entry-level candidates.

company_culture.summary: Describes a company that is renewing itself strongly and continuously developing a smarter, cleaner energy system, with roles that require collaboration across technical, project, communication and business teams; the culture is portrayed through themes of transformation and customer value rather than detailed statements about leadership style or internal values.

learning_possibilities.summary: In the available job ads, personal learning and career development are not described as a separate offering; development is only indirectly implied through exposure to complex energy systems, nuclear-related projects and data-intensive business work, and there is no explicit mention of structured training, internal academies or defined career paths.
